name: Happy Wagon
description:
A happy little game about the struggles of old-timey travelling.
Happy Wagon is a casual, retro-style game that tests your ability to manage resources and react to unexpected calamities.
Eat a cactus and see what happens, annihilate the snake and bunny population or trade with NPCs. In Happy Wagon random events occur while you travel through the desert. Keep track of your resources Food, Bullets, Boards and Nails to keep the wagon rolling. When an event occurs, you need to think fast: Click or don't click the button - It could be life or death. You can save your highscores locally and show off to your friends. Happy Wagon features several difficulties, unlockable characters, an endless mode and achievements.

Happy Travels!
